answers.answer: Try drinking some warm/hot water.  Maybe with some lemon. Kind of like tea!  Helps me sometimes.
The problem is,  I have hemeroids really bad and closed up,  nothing can get through.

Milk of magnesia should work. I have been constipated and took some yesterday. I had water come out but I am like blocked off so it was liquefied poop coming around the blockage and I will need to repeat for a couple of days to get it all out.
I just talked to my doctors nurse and she said same,  Ty for helping me as well,  I'm glad I'm not alone.. ... I really hate hemeroids lol
I had this problem a couple of weeks ago. Drink prune juice.  It's awful but it works! It has also stood the test of time.
I second the prune juice remedy.,i also have kiwi daily (heard it helps)
Prune juice with capful of milk of mag.
Drinking water is definitely going to help but you should be drinking a lot more on a regular basis. Try a big bowl of shredded wheat too!!

question: Any methods please,  the doctor wanted me to do milk since I'm gestational diabetes but I'm also lactose intolerant and now constipated I took a stool softener 6 hours ago, drank close to 2 bottles of water,  holding food down for now but I need remedys please
title: constipated and hurting
